keyMoments.description: Chopper uses his abilities to run through the snow attempting to reach Drum Castle
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Chopper's enhanced physical capabilities from the fruit

description: A Zoan-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to transform into a human. When consumed by an animal like Chopper, it grants human intelligence and the ability to take human forms.
A Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to eat anything and take on its properties or merge things they've eaten together.
